[[Guren]] releases two [[tenketsu]] points to greatly increase her [[chakra]] and physical capabilities for a short time by changing her life force into chakra. This allows the use of taxing techniques such as [[Crystal Release: String of Glory]]. The amount of chakra released is so much that it becomes visible and causes water to form a vortex around her, similar to the one caused by opening the "Sixth Gate of Joy" from the [[Eight Gates]]. Her eyes also turn completely white momentarily.
